cast.name: 露娜·米约维奇 Luna Mijovic

writer.name: 艾尔玛·塔塔拉吉奇 Elma Tataragić

introduction: LUNA is a charming, modern, young girl from Sarajevo who is about to get married with her long-term boyfriend Haris. MARTINA is an Italian girl who travels to Sarajevo to visit Matteo, her dear friend who is currently working in the Bosnian capital city. Matteo is also close friends with Haris; he introduces Martina to Luna.Meeting Martina is a dramatic turning point in Luna’s life: she falls in love and engages in a secret lesbian liaison, leading to a double life while her wedding preparations are on the go.When their relationship is discovered and Luna’s circle of dearest ones – family, boyfriend, friends – reacts harshly, Luna’s teenage brother, driven by Haris, makes a plan to teach Martina a lesson and push her to leave Sarajevo hoping that, this way, everything will go back to “normality”. But things get out of control and thus Luna has to make a crucial decision about her future...
